cause.description:
Help raise awareness in providing safe shelter for our lost and "unwanted" kittens by helping the SPCA.
************
"The mission of SPCA International is to raise the awareness of the abuse of animals to a global level, to eradicate the euthanasia of healthy and adoptable companion animals and to mount efforts to enhance animal welfare throughout the world.
We accomplish this mission by working both independently and together with local SPCA organizations in all countries."
(www.spca.com)
1. Adopt a pet!
2. Have your pets spayed and neutured.
3. Keep your cats indoors!
cause.mission: raise awareness and to prevent animal cruelty.
cause.name: Protect Our Furry Friends
